title: First Stream: Go Love
situation: Your channel is finally ready. Time to go live
choiceA_text: Start strong with an energetic intro

title: Chat Wants a Clicker Challenge
situation: “CLICKER! CLICKER!” Chat spams for a quick challenge.

title: Clicker Result Available
situation: The clicker results are in—chat awaits the verdict.

title: Clicker Champion!
situation: Victory! Chat explodes with Pog emotes.

title: Clicker Fumble
situation: Oof. Not your best. Chat teases—some playful and some mean.

title: Sponsor DM
situation: A peripheral brand pings you for a mid-stream read.

title: Cat on the Desk
situation: Your cat strolls into frame. Chat spams “PET THE CAT!”.
choiceB_text: Gently remove the cat; keep focus

title: Toxic Spike
situation: Hype brings trolls. Mods struggle to keep up.

title: Surprise Raid
situation: A friendly streamer raids you—hundreds pour in.
choiceA_text: Welcome raiders with a big bit

title: Hydration Reminder
situation: Stretch + hydrate? Tiny break might help.

title: Keep Your Promise
situation: Chat remembers you promised a clicker run.

title: Community Poll
situation: Chat wants to vote on the next segment.

title: Finale Checkpoint
situation: Time to wrap—do you end on a high or play safe?
